name: Clearwater Paper Corporation
description: Clearwater Paper Corporation is a leading manufacturer of quality consumer and commercial paper products. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Spokane, Washington, Clearwater Paper operates two primary business segments: Consumer Products and Timber. The Consumer Products segment produces a wide range of tissue products, including paper towels, bath tissue, and napkins, which are sold under various private label brands and through national retailers. The Timber segment focuses on the management and sale of timber and lumber products, supporting sustainable forestry practices in the Pacific Northwest. Clearwater Paper is committed to sustainability and responsible sourcing, emphasizing the use of renewable resources and minimizing its environmental footprint. The company’s mission is to produce high-quality products that meet the needs of customers while maintaining a strong commitment to ethical practices and community engagement. With a diverse portfolio of products and a robust supply chain, Clearwater Paper is well-positioned to meet the evolving demands of the marketplace while fostering long-term growth and profitability.

seo.meta_title: Clearwater Paper Corporation | Quality Paper Products and Sustainable Forestry
seo.meta_description: Discover Clearwater Paper Corporation, a leader in paper products and sustainable forestry. Explore our commitment to quality, sustainability, and community.

faq.question: What products does Clearwater Paper manufacture?
faq.answer: Clearwater Paper manufactures a variety of consumer products including paper towels, bath tissue, and napkins, as well as timber products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Clearwater Paper?
faq.answer: Linda K. Massman is the CEO of Clearwater Paper Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Clearwater Paper headquartered?
faq.answer: Clearwater Paper is headquartered in Spokane, Washington, USA.
